content:
Filon took a deep breath and continued, "I learned to make it when I was studying abroad in Italy. I spent a semester in Naples and became fascinated by their traditional pizza making techniques. When I returned to Mondstadt, I started experimenting with different recipes and ingredients until I finally landed on this one. I'm glad you all enjoy it."

Ganyu nodded appreciatively as she took another bite of her slice. "It's definitely a step above the pizzas we get at the local shops. The crust is perfectly chewy and the tomato sauce has such a rich, savory flavor."

Ningguang, who had been skeptical at first, also seemed to be enjoying her slice. "I must admit, it's quite good. You have a real talent for cooking, Filon."

Filon grinned and thanked everyone for their kind words. As they finished their slices and cleaned up, he couldn't help but feel a sense of pride and accomplishment. Cooking was a passion of his, and it was gratifying to see others enjoy the dishes he worked so hard to perfect."
